00014 const std::string helper_string = "add_roi";
00015 
00016 class AddRegionToList{
00017   EvalRois* _boss;
00018 public:
00019   AddRegionToList(EvalRois* boss) : _boss(boss) {}
00020   std::istream& operator()(std::istream& in){
00021     double a,b;
00022     if(in>>a>>b)
00023       _boss->AddRoi(a,b);
00024     return in;
00025   }
00026   std::ostream& operator()(std::ostream& out){
00027     const std::vector<double>* start = _boss->GetStartTimes();
00028     const std::vector<double>* end = _boss->GetEndTimes();
00029     for(size_t i = 0; i < start->size(); i++){
00030       out<<helper_string<<" "<<start->at(i)<<" "<<end->at(i)<<" ";
00031     }
00032     return out;
00033   }
00034 };
00035 
00036 class ClearRegionList{
00037   EvalRois* _boss;
00038 public:
00039   ClearRegionList(EvalRois* boss) : _boss(boss) {}
00040   std::istream& operator()(std::istream& in){
00041     _boss->ClearRegions();
00042     return in;
00043   }
00044 };

00046 
00047 EvalRois::EvalRois() : 
00048   ChannelModule(GetDefaultName(),
00049                 "Measure the max, min, and integral of samples over a set of regions of interest defined by start and end times in microseconds")
00050 {
00051   AddDependency<ConvertData>();
00052   AddDependency<BaselineFinder>();
00053   RegisterFunction(helper_string, 
00054                    AddRegionToList(this), AddRegionToList(this),
00055                    "Add a new region to the list of regions of interest");  
00056   RegisterReadFunction("clear_rois", ClearRegionList(this), 
00057                        "Clear the list of defined regions of interest");
00058 }
00059 
00060 EvalRois::~EvalRois() {}

00062 int EvalRois::Initialize()
00063 {
00064   if(_start_time.size() > 0){
00065     Message(DEBUG)<<"Saving info for "<<_start_time.size()<<" regions.\n";
00066   }
00067   else{
00068     Message(ERROR)<<"No ROIs defined for EvalRois!\n";
00069     return 1;
00070   }  
00071   return 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 int EvalRois::Finalize() { return 0; }
00075 
00076 int EvalRois::Process(ChannelData* chdata)
00077 {
00078   
00079   Baseline& base = chdata->baseline;
00080   if(!base.found_baseline) return 0;
00081   RunDB::runinfo* info = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetRunInfo();
00082   for(size_t window = 0; window < _start_time.size(); window++){
00083     chdata->regions.push_back(Roi());
00084     Roi& roi = chdata->regions.back();
00085     roi.start_time = _start_time[window];
00086     roi.end_time = _end_time[window];
00087     roi.start_index = (int)std::max(roi.start_time * chdata->sample_rate + 
00088                                     chdata->trigger_index , 0.);
00089     roi.end_index = (int)std::max(roi.end_time * chdata->sample_rate + 
00090                                   chdata->trigger_index, 0.);
00091     roi.start_index = std::min(roi.start_index, chdata->nsamps);
00092     roi.end_index = std::min(roi.end_index, chdata->nsamps);
00093     
00094     //double* wave = chdata->GetWaveform();
00095     double* subtractedwave = chdata->GetBaselineSubtractedWaveform();
00096     double* min_iter = std::min_element(subtractedwave+roi.start_index, subtractedwave+roi.end_index);
00097     double* max_iter = std::max_element(subtractedwave+roi.start_index, subtractedwave+roi.end_index);
00098     roi.max = *(max_iter);
00099     roi.min = *(min_iter);
00100     roi.min_index = min_iter-subtractedwave;
00101     
00102     if(! chdata->integral.empty()){
00103       roi.integral = chdata->integral[roi.end_index] - 
00104         chdata->integral[roi.start_index];
00105     }
00106     else{
00107       
00108       roi.integral = std::accumulate(subtractedwave+roi.start_index,
00109                                      subtractedwave+roi.end_index,
00110                                      0.);
00111     }
00112     RunDB::runinfo::channelinfo* chinfo = 
00113       info->GetChannelInfo(chdata->channel_id);
00114     if(chinfo)
00115       roi.npe = -roi.integral / chinfo->spe_mean;
00116     else 
00117       roi.npe = -roi.integral;
00118   }
00119   
00120   return 0;
00121 }
